short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost the volume of audio in your browser beyond the default limit. Enhance your multimedia experience with this simple extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Volume Booster is a browser extension designed to increase the volume of audio played in your browser. This extension allows you to adjust the sound level beyond the default limits set by the browser, enhancing your multimedia experience.

With Volume Booster, you can boost the volume of your browser’s audio beyond its usual limits, which is particularly useful for low-volume videos, music, or during online meetings. The extension is straightforward and easy to use, requiring just a click to quickly adjust the volume to your preference. It improves overall sound quality by making quieter audio more audible, ensuring a better listening experience.

Volume Booster works across all websites, so whether you’re watching a video on YouTube, listening to a podcast, or participating in a video conference, it’s compatible with your needs. It integrates seamlessly with your browser without affecting performance, providing a simple and effective solution for enhancing audio.

If you’ve ever struggled with insufficient sound levels in your browser, Volume Booster is the ideal solution to improve volume and sound quality with ease.
